verse: यस्या रेणुं पादयोर्विश्वभर्ता धरणे मूर्ध्नि रहसि प्रेमयुक्तः। यस्या अंके विलुण्ठन् कृष्णदेवो गोलोकाख्यं नैव सस्मार धामपदं सांशा कमला शैलपुत्री तां राधिकां शक्तिधात्रीं नमामः
meaning: Meaning: I offer my salutations to Radhika, the source of all power, who, with love, keeps the dust particles from the feet of the sustainer of the universe hidden on her head in the earth, and twirls Krishna, the Lord of Goloka, in her lap. She is not remembered as the abode of Goloka, a partial manifestation of Lakshmi, the daughter of the mountain.
